Name: ITP - Route 377 Bus Stop Extension - Enabling Works - Footpath, Kerb and channel

METHODS OR REFERENCE: TDM Technical Standard - KC0002
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: GAP65 subbase in roads (CBR>5)
RECORDS: FH concrete QA sheet, photos. Concrete Plant Docket
METHODS OR REFERENCE: TDM Technical Standards - KC0001
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Channels must be laid to flow water in the direction of the nearest cesspit in a manner such that no water ponds and match existing road level

METHODS OR REFERENCE: TDM Technical Standards - FP0001

ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA: Tactile to be yellow concrete paver slab type. Tactile indicators shall be aligned such as warning tiles are perpendicular to the line of crossing.
